welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ebina, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ebina has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: 板そば 喜右衛門
restaurants.description: 板そば 喜右衛門 is a soba restaurant located in 厚木市.

restaurants.name: パン工房ブンブン 厚木店
restaurants.description: パン工房ブンブン 厚木店 is a bakery located in 厚木市.

restaurants.name: Suishoen (酔笑苑)
restaurants.description: Suishoen (酔笑苑) is a bbq joint located in 厚木市.

restaurants.name: Atsugiya (厚木家)
restaurants.description: Atsugiya (厚木家) is a ramen restaurant located in 厚木市.

restaurants.name: Komeda's Coffee (コメダ珈琲店)
restaurants.description: Komeda's Coffee (コメダ珈琲店) is a café located in 厚木市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Yokota AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to military and government flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by selecting 'Yokota Airport WiFi' and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal of Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport for up to 3 hours.
